abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information}, or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} related to your knowledge of underground environments or creatures, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.36c6cbe556fbb639]{Delve the Depths} underground, add +1. On a strong hit, also choose one.

  • This is the way: Mark progress twice.
  • Hunker down: You find a secure location in addition to the result of @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4da87fd54eaa1b89]{Find an Opportunity}. You may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.30046577bc83f2f0]{Make Camp} now and reroll any dice.
  • Lay of the land: The next time you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.36c6cbe556fbb639]{Delve the Depths} in this site, you may reroll any dice.
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} in an underground environment, reroll any dice.
